items.title: How expensive are the Indian stock markets? A quick check on PE multiples

items.title: F&O Cues: DIIs net long in Nifty highest in 2 months; futures premium sink
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 03: The Nifty September futures premium tumbled from Rs 141 on Friday to Rs 61 on Monday. DIIs added fresh longs in Nifty futures, while FIIs sold.

items.title: Premier Energies shares double investors money with bumper debut on bourses
items.description: Premier Energies IPO listing today: The company's shares listed at Rs 991 on the BSE, reflecting a whopping 120.22 per cent premium over the upper end of its issue price of Rs 450

items.title: Aadhar Housing up 6% as Kotak Institutional initiates coverage with 'Buy'
items.description: The surge in Aadhar Housing share came after Kotak Institutional Equities initiated coverage on the company with 'Buy' rating for a target price of Rs 550, marking an upside of 41%.

items.title: Matrimony.com surges 14% as board to mull share buyback on Sept 05
items.description: The stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 848, surged 14% on the BSE in Tuesday's intra-day trade and has rallied 40% in three weeks.

items.title: Crude Oil: Check trading strategy, target price and other key levels here
items.description: Oil recorded its first back-to-back monthly decline amid signs of sluggish demand in China and the United States raised concerns about future consumption growth.

items.title: Brigade Enterprises launches QIP issue to raise funds up to Rs 1,500 cr

items.description: The proposed unit, with a production capacity of six million chips per day, will be setup with an investment of Rs 3,300 crore.

items.description: These aero-engines will be manufactured at the Koraput division of HAL and the delivery of these aero-engines would start after one year and complete over a period of eight years, the company said.

items.title: ICICI Bank, Zee in focus amid allegations on Sebi chief Buch; outlook here
